alert.note: Alert for Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range; Uplands of the Bootheel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 12 at 1:24PM MST until December 13 at 11:00AM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches. Windy conditions causing areas of blowing snow. * WHERE...Gila Region and the Black Range above 6500 feet, and the New Mexico Bootheel Highlands. * WHEN...Monday afternoon through early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...Roads may become slick, snow packed, and hazardous. Areas of blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility in the Gila Region and Black Range. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest snow amounts are expected in areas north of Silver City above 7000 ft and the NM Bootheel Highlands. Isolated areas with higher snow amounts are possible.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning means heavy amounts of snow is expected or occurring. Strong winds are also possible. This will make travel very hazardous or impossible.

area.areaDesc: Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range; Uplands of the Bootheel
